name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#夏色FullBloom ⧸ 夏色まつり誕生ライブ【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [pKc5qSSWJQs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Natsuiro Matsuri performs 'Happy Halloween' on a Halloween-themed 3D stage.
Natsuiro Matsuri is joined by Aki Rosenthal and Momosuzu Nene to perform 'Halloween Night, Tonight!'.

subtitles.original:
Happy Halloween
作詞・作曲：Junky
subtitles.english:
Happy Halloween
Lyrics/Composition: Junky

subtitles.original: ねぇ　もう　暗くなりそうだから
subtitles.english: Hey, it's already getting dark,

subtitles.original: デッチャでもいいかしら
subtitles.english: so would it be okay if I come out?

subtitles.original: ちょっとね　魔法にかけられた
subtitles.english: You know, I've been put under a little magic.

subtitles.original: 君のお菓子から食べちゃうぞ
subtitles.english: I'll start by eating your sweets!

subtitles.original: きっと　霧が濃くなるから
subtitles.english: The fog will surely get thicker,

subtitles.original: みな　集まるかな
subtitles.english: so I wonder if everyone will gather?

subtitles.original: じっと待って　甘いもの我慢した
subtitles.english: I waited patiently and resisted the sweets.

subtitles.original: ご褒美を　ほら　きた
subtitles.english: Look, here comes my reward!

subtitles.original: ひとつ　ふたつ　鐘の音
subtitles.english: One, two, the sound of the bell.

subtitles.original: 騒ぎ出す　小さいオバケたち
subtitles.english: The little ghosts are starting to make a fuss.

subtitles.original: 今日は　許して　くれるのさ
subtitles.english: They'll forgive us for today.

subtitles.original: さぁ　街に行こう
subtitles.english: Now, let's go to the city!

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween!

subtitles.original: イタズラしちゃうぞ ding-dong-dang
subtitles.english: I'm going to play a trick, ding-dong-dang!

subtitles.original: あっちもこっちも trick or treat
subtitles.english: Trick or treat here and there!

subtitles.original: キャンディはくれないの？
subtitles.english: Won't you give me any candy?

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween!

subtitles.original: いたいけなランタンパンプキン
subtitles.english: The innocent lantern pumpkin.

subtitles.original: 疲れたジャックも踊るよ　朝まで
subtitles.english: Tired Jack will dance too, until morning!

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween!

subtitles.original: オバケのカボチャもラララ
subtitles.english: The ghost pumpkin too, la la la!

subtitles.original: 今日は街中 trick or treat
subtitles.english: Today, it's trick or treat all over town!

subtitles.original: チョコも頂戴よ
subtitles.english: Give me some chocolate too!

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween!

subtitles.original: 不思議な世界へようこそ
subtitles.english: Welcome to the mysterious world!

subtitles.original: 疲れたジャックも歌うよ　Let's happy halloween
subtitles.english: Tired Jack will sing too, Let's happy halloween!

subtitles.original: もっと　もっと　ほしがって
subtitles.english: Wanting more and more,

subtitles.original: 欲張りなゴースト
subtitles.english: the greedy ghost.

subtitles.original: もうない？　それなら
subtitles.english: Is there no more? In that case,

subtitles.original: イタズラのえじきね
subtitles.english: you'll be the victim of a prank!

subtitles.original: 紅茶じゃない?　いやさ　なんて
subtitles.english: Not tea? Oh, no!

subtitles.original: 言い切りたい　トイレットペーパー
subtitles.english: I want to say, toilet paper!

subtitles.original: ぐるぐるしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Let's spin it around!

subtitles.original: 今夜はランタン灯してるなら
subtitles.english: If the lantern is lit tonight,

subtitles.original: 甘いの頂戴　さぁ　パーティは終わらない
subtitles.english: give me something sweet! The party won't end!

subtitles.original: ほら　だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Look, because it's Happy Halloween!

subtitles.original: 時計も回る tick-tack
subtitles.english: The clock turns too, tick-tack!

subtitles.original: あっちもこっちも trick or treat
subtitles.english: Trick or treat here and there!

subtitles.original: 目もくらむパンプキンパイ
subtitles.english: A dazzling pumpkin pie!

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween!

subtitles.original: だから夜更かししちゃうじゃない
subtitles.english: That's why we stay up late, don't we?

subtitles.original: 疲れたジャックも寝ないわ　朝まで
subtitles.english: Tired Jack won't sleep either, until morning!

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween!

subtitles.original: 今日は Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Today is Happy Halloween!

subtitles.original: さぁ　Let's trick or treat
subtitles.english: Now, let's trick or treat!

subtitles.original: 赤いキャンディ転がして
subtitles.english: Roll the red candy!

subtitles.original: 朝まで寝たくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to sleep until morning!

subtitles.original:
今宵はHalloween Night!
作詞・作曲：山崎寛子 / 編曲：河合泰志 (Arte Refact)
subtitles.english:
Tonight is Halloween Night!
Lyrics/Composition: Hiroko Yamazaki / Arrangement: Taishi Kawai (Arte Refact)

subtitles.original: 今宵は Halloween Night!
subtitles.english: Tonight is Halloween Night!

subtitles.original: 今宵は Halloween Night!
subtitles.english: Tonight is Halloween Night!

subtitles.original: 12時　鳴り響いた教会
subtitles.english: At 12 o'clock, the church bells rang.

subtitles.original: 気づけば　通り過ぎてる
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, I'd passed by.

subtitles.original: 見つけた　摩訶不思議な招待
subtitles.english: I found a most mysterious invitation.

subtitles.original: 逃げたら　お仕置きするぞ
subtitles.english: If you run away, I'll punish you!

subtitles.original: ほらほら　お菓子を頂戴
subtitles.english: Come on, come on, give me some candy!

subtitles.original: くれなきゃ　イタズラするぞ
subtitles.english: If you don't, I'll play a trick on you!
